terms.meaning: Data ko understand karne ke liye initial investigation.
terms.example: Graphs, charts se data patterns dekhna.

terms.meaning: Data mein errors, missing values fix karna.
terms.example: Null values fill karna, duplicates remove karna.

terms.meaning: Raw data se useful features create karna.
terms.example: Date se day, month, year separate karna.

terms.meaning: Do variables ke beech relationship measure karna.
terms.example: Height aur weight mein positive correlation.

terms.meaning: Continuous values predict karne ka method.
terms.example: House price prediction based on features.

terms.meaning: Data ko categories mein divide karna.
terms.example: Email spam ya not spam classify karna.

terms.meaning: Similar data points ko groups mein organize karna.
terms.example: Customers ko behavior ke basis pe group karna.

terms.meaning: Model performance reliably measure karne ka technique.
terms.example: K-fold cross-validation for model evaluation.

terms.meaning: Model ke settings optimize karna better performance ke liye.
terms.example: Learning rate, batch size adjust karna.

terms.meaning: Multiple models combine kar ke better results lena.
terms.example: Random Forest multiple decision trees use karta hai.

terms.meaning: Bootstrap Aggregating, multiple models train kar ke average lena.
terms.example: Random Forest bagging technique use karta hai.

terms.meaning: Weak models ko sequentially improve kar ke strong model banana.
terms.example: AdaBoost, Gradient Boosting algorithms.

terms.meaning: Tree structure mein decisions represent karne wala model.
terms.example: If-else conditions ka tree form.

terms.meaning: Multiple decision trees ka ensemble.
terms.example: 100 trees ka forest better predictions deta hai.

terms.meaning: Data points ko optimal boundary se separate karne wala algorithm.
terms.example: High-dimensional data classification ke liye.

terms.meaning: Data ko K clusters mein divide karne ka algorithm.
terms.example: Customers ko 5 groups mein segment karna.

terms.meaning: Data dimensions reduce karne ka technique.
terms.example: 100 features ko 10 main components mein convert karna.

terms.meaning: Classification model ki performance visualize karne ka table.
terms.example: True positive, false positive counts show karna.

terms.meaning: Predicted positive mein se kitne actually positive hain.
terms.example: Spam detection mein false positives minimize karna.

terms.meaning: Actual positive mein se kitne correctly identify hue.
terms.example: Disease detection mein false negatives minimize karna.

terms.meaning: Straight line fit kar ke continuous values predict karna.
terms.example: Sales prediction based on advertising spend.

terms.meaning: Probability calculate kar ke binary classification karna.
terms.example: Email spam probability calculate karna.

terms.meaning: Bayes theorem use kar ke classification karna.
terms.example: Text classification, spam detection.

terms.meaning: Nearest data points dekh kar prediction karna.
terms.example: Similar customers ke behavior se predict karna.

terms.meaning: Errors pe focus kar ke sequentially models improve karna.
terms.example: XGBoost, LightGBM algorithms.

terms.meaning: Adaptive Boosting, weak learners ko combine karna.
terms.example: Multiple weak classifiers ka strong ensemble.

terms.meaning: Extreme Gradient Boosting, optimized gradient boosting.
terms.example: Kaggle competitions mein popular algorithm.

terms.meaning: Light Gradient Boosting Machine, fast aur efficient.
terms.example: Large datasets ke liye optimized boosting.

terms.meaning: Categorical Boosting, categorical features handle karta hai.
terms.example: Mixed data types ke liye suitable algorithm.

terms.meaning: Anomaly detection ke liye tree-based algorithm.
terms.example: Fraud detection, outlier identification.

terms.meaning: Density-based clustering algorithm.
terms.example: Irregular shaped clusters find karna.

terms.meaning: Tree structure mein clusters organize karna.
terms.example: Dendrogram create kar ke clusters visualize karna.

terms.meaning: Multiple Gaussian distributions ka mixture for clustering.
terms.example: Soft clustering where points belong to multiple clusters.

terms.meaning: Reinforcement learning algorithm for optimal actions.
terms.example: Game playing AI mein optimal moves learn karna.

terms.meaning: State-Action-Reward-State-Action reinforcement learning.
terms.example: On-policy learning algorithm for RL.

terms.meaning: Policy aur value function dono learn karne wala RL method.
terms.example: Continuous action spaces ke liye suitable.

terms.meaning: Random sampling use kar ke problems solve karna.
terms.example: Pi value estimate karna random points se.

terms.meaning: Future state sirf current state pe depend karta hai.
terms.example: Weather prediction, text generation.

terms.meaning: Observable outputs se hidden states infer karna.
terms.example: Speech recognition, gene sequencing.

terms.meaning: Missing data ke saath parameters estimate karna.
terms.example: Gaussian Mixture Models mein parameter learning.
